tracks.text: A flaming phoenix logo and the word Kadokawa reflect in water.
The ball of faces ascends into the clouds.
At night, dozens of lizard men gather in a hut.
Head Priestess
Chief Shasha
Head Warrior
Head Hunter
The chief crosses his arms and eyes Zuzu
Chief's tail thwacks. All turn.
Yusu's silver sword

The moon shines over the marsh. Yusu walks through thigh high water, carrying large fish over his shoulder. He walks towards a lonely, crumbling shack. He pauses, as the moon shines on a ramp. Chief Shasuryu looks up.
He throws small fish through a window. Snake heads reach out and grab fish.
4 large snakes peak out the window and approach. He pets each head.
Rororo, a hydra with 4 snake heads, sidles up to Zuzu
One head pulls Zuzu up and tosses him in the air. He lands on Rororo's back.
Rororo turns
Shasha watches as Zuzu rides Rororo through the marsh. The half moon shines through the cloudless night.
Nazarick, day time. Demiurge walks down a hallway, smiling.
Eclair exits Ains's room.
Eclair's attendant, a man in a suit wearing a gimp mask, procures a comb. Eclair combs a a line of curled, blond hair.
Rororo walks through the marsh under the sun.
They approach a collection of huts. The roofs are conic and made of pale skins.
Rororo watches as Zuzu approaches. Label, Red Eye Tribe Village.
Warriors stand behind sharpened pikes, held together by rope. A flag waves, bearing an emblem of a shining eye.
A gate opens, revealing an elderly lizard man.
Yusu follows the elder, escorted on all sides by warriors.
He pushes a cloth door aside and enters a round hut.
A slender, albino lizard woman with red markings. Yusu gapes.
Her face is small and round, like a baby snake, with large red eyes. He trembles and stumbles towards her.
He kneels before her and opens his mouth
Her tail sticks up
He tenses
Her tail wags wildly
Her eyes spin
He reaches out a hand and caresses her neck
Her eyes narrow. He startles. They pant, their tails thumping.
He sits and looks back at his tail. It slows, then lies flat. Her tail stands still.
She covers her face, tears dripping from her eyes. He wraps an arm around her neck. She looks up at him.
She blushes. Her tail beats.
She looks down, then back at him.
They bow to each other, their tails sticking high in the air.
Yusu yawns outside the gate.
Crush walks out, wearing a leafy green bush.
Elaborate building. An insectoid maid talks to insectoid warriors.
The hydra walks across the marsh under the sun. Yusu and Crush ride on its back.
Long, thatched huts rest on platforms in tall trees. Label, Dragon Tusk Tribe Village
Yusu and Crush jump down from Rororo. Warriors gather.
A green lizard man bearing an axe
He swings his axe around
He narrows his green eyes. Deep scars gouge his long cheek.
Lyrics, Don't hesitate to face destruction
You know, even the pieces remaining within these hands
will protect you
Even if I lose everything
I have something to offer.
My future, my life
My burnt-out emotions
My fruitless prayers
The ugliness I cling to
The foolishness I provide
My ailed voice
My stained hands
And my heart, held open by the scars
